meanings.definition: Of or relating to a lacuna or cavity.
meanings.sent1: The lacunars design on the ceiling added a sense of depth to the room.
meanings.sent2: The lacunars pattern on the wall highlighted the architectural beauty of the building.
meanings.sent3: The lacunars decorations made the room look like a cozy hideaway.
meanings.sent4: The lacunars details created a mysterious atmosphere in the chamber.
meanings.sent5: The lacunars features gave the space a unique and intriguing look.

meanings.definition: A small opening or space in a surface or structure.
meanings.sent1: The tiny lacunars in the wall allowed a glimpse of light to filter through.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a few lacunars in the fence where the curious squirrel peeked through.
meanings.sent3: The lacunars in the tree trunk seemed like secret windows to another world.
meanings.sent4: The lacunars in the old door whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The lacunars in the rock formation created a natural frame for the view.

meanings.definition: A decorative panel or ceiling with sunken panels.
meanings.sent1: The lacunars in the ornate ceiling added an elegant touch to the room.
meanings.sent2: The intricate lacunars on the wall were a focal point of the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The lacunars on the door made it look like a grand entrance to a palace.
meanings.sent4: The lacunars on the stage set the scene for the theatrical performance.
meanings.sent5: The lacunars on the wooden beams gave the room a sense of grandeur.
